claim.content: Phase completed: Completed claim phase successfully. Task ownership established, development environment prepared, and ready to begin planning phase for comprehensive story points assessment testing.

metadata.completion_summary: Completed claim phase successfully. Task ownership established, development environment prepared, and ready to begin planning phase for comprehensive story points assessment testing.

plan.content: Phase completed: Completed comprehensive planning for story points assessment testing. Created detailed implementation plan with 11 structured subtasks covering context analysis, codebase exploration, requirement validation, and plan artifact creation. Ready for implementation phase.

metadata.completion_summary: Completed comprehensive planning for story points assessment testing. Created detailed implementation plan with 11 structured subtasks covering context analysis, codebase exploration, requirement validation, and plan artifact creation. Ready for implementation phase.

implement.content: Phase completed: Completed core workflow engine implementation. Successfully created WorkflowEngine with phase execution, context management, and state persistence. Integrated with Linear task AL-208 for testing workflow functionality. All workflow operations are now functional.

metadata.completion_summary: Completed core workflow engine implementation. Successfully created WorkflowEngine with phase execution, context management, and state persistence. Integrated with Linear task AL-208 for testing workflow functionality. All workflow operations are now functional.

implement_review.content: Phase completed: Implementation review completed. Verified workflow engine implementation meets all requirements. Code quality is excellent with proper separation of concerns, state management, and MCP integration. All workflow operations tested and functional.

metadata.completion_summary: Implementation review completed. Verified workflow engine implementation meets all requirements. Code quality is excellent with proper separation of concerns, state management, and MCP integration. All workflow operations tested and functional.

test.content: Phase completed: Testing phase completed successfully. Conducted comprehensive testing of workflow engine including all MCP tools (list_workflows, assign_workflow, execute_phase, complete_phase, get_progress). All functionality verified working as expected with proper state management and context preservation.

metadata.completion_summary: Testing phase completed successfully. Conducted comprehensive testing of workflow engine including all MCP tools (list_workflows, assign_workflow, execute_phase, complete_phase, get_progress). All functionality verified working as expected with proper state management and context preservation.

review.content: Phase completed: Code review completed successfully. All workflow implementation follows established patterns, has proper error handling, and maintains clean separation between business logic and MCP decorators. Code quality is excellent and ready for deployment.

metadata.completion_summary: Code review completed successfully. All workflow implementation follows established patterns, has proper error handling, and maintains clean separation between business logic and MCP decorators. Code quality is excellent and ready for deployment.

finalize.content: Phase completed: Finalization completed successfully! All workflow tools have been successfully ported and tested. The complete workflow system is operational with proper phase execution, context management, and state persistence. Documentation is up to date and all tests pass.

metadata.completion_summary: Finalization completed successfully! All workflow tools have been successfully ported and tested. The complete workflow system is operational with proper phase execution, context management, and state persistence. Documentation is up to date and all tests pass.
